title: Cololura Elegant Sexy Floral Lace Short Sleeve Off Shoulder Evening Gown Party Formal Bodycon Midi Dress
description: Material: The floral lace short sleeve off shoulder is made of 95% polyester, 5% spandex, super soft, micro-elastic, breathable and skin-friendly. Elegant and sexy style dress.

Design: Sexy off shoulder bodycon dress, with floral lace on bodice and hemline, short sleeve, hips-wrapped, square neck, mid-calf length, slim fit, this cocktail Gown pencil dress gives you an eye-catching look, sexy without being revealing.

Occasion: This square neck bodycon midi dress is suitable for various occasions, formal occasions, evening prom, party, weddings, cocktail party, birthday party, weddings, dating, casual, graduation dress, night club, date, valentine's day, anniversaries, etc.

Matching: This women sexy solid midi dress is perfect for style with belt, high heels, necklace, hat, earrings and other things, which will make your look more charming. a perfect gift for your girlfriend, friends, and families.

Size: Model wearing size S. Model Stats: Bust: 33.6-34.8"/85.5-88.5cm, Hips: 34.8-36"/88.5-91.5cm, Waist: 26-26.7"/66-68cm. Item runs true to the size chart and is cut to suit our size chart. Please refer to our size chart among the pictures and choose the right size for yourself. If you need help, please feel free to contact us, we will recomment for you.
